title: Milton Williams won’t return for Patriots against Jets, but team gets good news on TreVeyon Henderson

title: Officials give update on deadly Christmas Eve fire in Needham
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News Investigators believe that the blaze, which killed a 21-year-old woman, was accidental.
Firefighters worked at the scene of a house fire on Woodworth Road in Needham on Wednesday morning.
Natick Fire Department Officials gave an update Friday on the investigation surrounding a deadly Christmas Eve fire that occurred in Needham.

title: MLB insider shares what Red Sox are asking for in a possible Jarren Duran trade

Jarren Duran has been at the center of trade rumors for much of the offseason.

title: Wachusett Mountain’s new summit lift opened Friday after delays

title: Oversight board decertifies former Stoughton deputy chief tied to Sandra Birchmore case
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News Robert Devine used an alias to communicate with Birchmore and met her for a sexual encounter before she died, the commission ruled.
ShareSend this article to your social connections.
Former Stoughton deputy police chief Robert Devine had his law enforcement certification revoked by the state’s police oversight board last week.
